product_description.product_name: MaxCem® Type IS portland blast-furnace slag cement
product_description.basic_use: MaxCem® Type IS portland blast-furnace slag cement is used in a wide variety of commercial and architectural applications. It is resistant to harsh environmental influences.
product_description.packaging: Regionally available and can be supplied in bulk quantities.
product_description.composition_and_materials: Primary ingredients are portland cement or clinker, granulated blast-furnace slag (GBFS), and gypsum.
product_description.types: Produced to meet the requirements of ASTM C595 (Type IS) and AASHTO M 240 (Type IS).
benefits: Meets the requirements of ASTM C595
Meets the requirements of AASHTO M 240
product_description.limitations: Good concreting practices are required. Attention must be given to formwork, batching, mixing, placing, finishing, and curing.

lca_information.physical_chemical_properties: Manufactured to conform to all applicable requirements for the designated type of ASTM C595 and AASHTO M 240.

transport_and_installation.requirements: Consult specific project requirements or applicable specifications and guides.
transport_and_installation.preparatory_work: Deliver products in original, unopened containers. Store materials protected from harmful conditions.
transport_and_installation.methods: Proper proportioning, batching, mixing, placing, consolidating, finishing, and curing are critical.
transport_and_installation.safety_precautions: Refer to the applicable Safety Data Sheet (SDS). Avoid direct contact with skin and eyes.

recycled_materials_handling.content: Contains some portion of pre-consumer recycled materials.

additional_info.availability_and_cost: Regionally available. Contact the nearest Holcim (US) Inc. sales office for pricing.
additional_info.warranty: Material Certification Reports available upon request. No guarantee on finish work.
additional_info.technical_services: Available by contacting the nearest Holcim (US) Inc. sales office.
additional_info.filing_systems: Additional product information is available from the manufacturer.
